summary: I TOOK IT TO THE DEALER THEY SAID THEY FIXED THE PROBLEM BUT HE TRANSMISSION STILL SLIPS.  THE LAST VAN I HAD DID THE SAME THING IT WAS A 1998 WINDSTAR.  THEY TOLD ME THERE WAS NOTHING WRONG WITH IT AND IN 3 MONTHS I HAD TO HAVE THE WHOLE THING REBUILT.  *NLM    **DIMSII IVOQ ENTRY POSTED AFTER 12/12/02 CUT-OVER TO ARTEMIS*768017
